author: PlayStation
description:
Halo: Campaign Evolved – a faithful yet modernized remake of the Halo: Combat Evolved campaign – coming in 2026. In this developer roundtable, the Halo Studios team shares insights on the overall vision and some of the new enhancements and features being added to this timeless classic.  

Experience the original story rebuilt with high-definition visuals, updated cinematics, and refined controls, plus three brand-new prequel missions featuring the Master Chief and Sgt. Johnson. A broader arsenal of weapons, vehicles, enemies, and gameplay-modifying “Skulls” – optional modifiers that change combat in fun and challenging ways – add fresh tactics and endless replayability.  

Play it your way: solo, 2-player splitscreen co-op on console, or up to 4-player online co-op on console and PC with full crossplay and cross-progression support.  Whether you’re discovering Halo for the first time or returning to the ring after 25 years, Halo: Campaign Evolved delivers an adventure that feels both
title: Halo: Campaign Evolved - Roundtable Reveal | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Step into the fight with Halo: Campaign Evolved.

The Covenant believe the Silent Cartographer lies hidden beneath this island — a key that could unlock the secrets of Halo itself. Your mission: locate the map room and uncover the path to the ring’s control center.

Halo: Campaign Evolved, coming to PlayStation 5 in 2026, is a faithful yet modernized remake of Halo: Combat Evolved’s campaign, rebuilt from the ground up with high-definition visuals, refined controls, 2-player split screen co-op on console, up to 4-player online co-op on console and PC, 3 new missions, an expanded arsenal of weapons, vehicles, new enemies, and more.

Wishlist now on PlayStation.

#ps5 #ps5games #halo
title: Halo: Campaign Evolved - "The Silent Cartographer" Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:

The Outer Worlds 2 is the eagerly-awaited sequel to the award-winning first-person sci-fi RPG from Obsidian Entertainment (just look at the exciting number of dashes in this sentence!). Time to clear your calendar – get ready for an action-packed adventure with a new crew, new weapons, and new enemies in a new colony! So much newness!

Play now with the Premium Edition.

#ps5 #ps5games #theouterworlds2

Jester and his best friend Sok are bringing their improv show to PlayStation 5!

Once Upon a Jester is a whimsical adventure about improvisation, friendship, and the joy of making people laugh. Join Jester and Sok as they travel from town to town performing hilarious, heartfelt theater shows — all improvised by you!

author: PlayStation
description:
WISHLIST NOW: 
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015709

Dollmare is coming out on 6th November 2025!

You were desperate for money and accepted a shady job at a doll factory. What seemed like an easy way to make a quick buck turned out to be something much more sinister.

INSPECT ANOMALOUS DOLLS
Carefully inspect each doll for strange defects or eerie behavior. Spot every anomaly, from subtle flaws to unsettling movements, and ensure that only the ‘safe’ dolls make it through.

CREEPY WITHOUT SCREAMERS
Not in the mood to be chased and screamed at by monsters? Tired of jumpscares and endless fights for survival? Dollmare is just for you.
It’s still a horror game - you'll get scared, feel uneasy and constantly sense that something is watching you. There's no telling what might happen… but something definitely will.

UNIQUE PLAYTHROUGHS
Every playthrough is slightly different. Many events in the game are not scripted, meaning that what you encounter is shaped by the moment.
title: Dollmare - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10013555

The deep keeps its secrets, and its dead...

Beneath Launches on October 28th on PlayStation 5 

Celebrate the launch of Beneath with a launch trailer that is a love letter to the golden age of shooters and 2000's vibes. 

Beneath is a Lovecraft-inspired survival FPS built by two brothers. Scarce ammo, merciless enemies and a sense of the unknown combine in a 10+ hour, story-driven single player campaign, built for both veteran gamers and those seeking an old school experience 

Seasoned diver Noah Quinn’s routine expedition plunges him into chaos, trapping him in the depths of the ocean, where an ancient evil lurks. As supplies dwindle and nightmarish creatures close in, Noah must confront horrifying mutations and unravel a sinister conspiracy that threatens humanity itself. With his daughter’s life hanging in the balance, Noah is pushed to his limits in a desperate race against time. Can he uncover the truth and stop an ancient horror
title: Beneath - Ride Or Die Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

The wait is over—Chicken Run: Eggstraction is out now! 🐔
Step back into the world of Chicken Run right where Dawn of the Nugget left off, full of daring missions, tricky challenges and mischievous villains to outsmart.

Cutscenes packed with classic Aardman comedy
Sneak, puzzle-solve, and lead your flock to freedom
Available now on PlayStation 🎮
